name: donk
description:
listen here bro, this is most likely the best video game about donkeys ever made. play as donkehman whose friends call him donk and figure out what to do. short and poignant game with introspective ending. have fun and relax and take time to complete while metaphorically smelling the roses too.

developed with rpgmaker vx ace. no rtp required. download and extract the files and launch the executable to play.
